Uses of Package
com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule

  • Packages that use com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule 
    Package Description
    com.guardtime.envelope.verification.policy
    Defining of the verification policies
    com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule
    Creating and handling of the verification rules
    com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.generic
    Implementation of general verification rules
    com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.signature
    Signature specific verification rules
    com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.signature.ksi
    Implementation of KSI signature verification rules
  • Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule used by com.guardtime.envelope.verification.policy 
    Class and Description
    Rule
    Rule to be performed during verification of Envelope or its components.
  • Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule used by com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule 
    Class and Description
    Rule
    Rule to be performed during verification of Envelope or its components.
    RuleTerminatingException
    To be used when verification process should be halted due to rule failure which dictates that no more verification rules can be executed or an unrecoverable error was encountered during rule execution.
    RuleType
    Verification rule types.
  • Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule used by com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.generic 
    Class and Description
    AbstractRule 
    Rule
    Rule to be performed during verification of Envelope or its components.
    RuleTerminatingException
    To be used when verification process should be halted due to rule failure which dictates that no more verification rules can be executed or an unrecoverable error was encountered during rule execution.
  • Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule used by com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.signature

    To be used when verification process should be halted due to rule failure which dictates that no more verification rules can be executed or an unrecoverable error was encountered during rule execution.
  • Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule used by com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.signature.ksi
